Instance Methods

applyFilterPass(filter : pixi.filters.AbstractFilter, filterArea : pixi.textures.Texture, width : Float, height : Float) : Void

parameters
filter {AbstractFilter} the filter that needs to be applied
filterArea {texture} TODO - might need an update
width {Number} the horizontal range of the filter
height {Number} the vertical range of the filter
Applies the filter to the specified area.

begin(renderSession : Dynamic, buffer : Dynamic) : Void

parameters
renderSession {RenderSession}
buffer {ArrayBuffer}

destroy() : Void

Destroys the filter and removes it from the filter stack.

initShaderBuffers() : Void

Initialises the shader buffers.

popFilter() : Void

Removes the last filter from the filter stack and doesn't return it.

pushFilter(filterBlock : Dynamic) : Void

parameters
filterBlock {Object} the filter that will be pushed to the current filter stack
Applies the filter and adds it to the current filter stack.

setContext(gl : Dynamic) : Void

parameters
gl {WebGLContext} the current WebGL drawing context
Initialises the context and the properties.
